metadata.title: arbitrary code execution allows document complied with older version (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability was found in LuaTeX (TeX Live) that allows any document compiled with older versions of LuaTeX to execute arbitrary shell commands, even with shell escape disabled.
